articles.description: Watch live coverage from day one of Wimbledon, with defending men's champion Carlos Alcaraz and Great Britain's Emma Raducanu among those in action.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 LIVE: Day 1 - Alcaraz, Raducanu, Sinner, Gauff in action - tennis scores, results & order of play

articles.description: Reaction as England beat Slovakia after extra-time to reach quarter-finals of Euro 2024 with goals from Jude Bellingham and Harry Kane.
articles.title: Euro 2024 live: Bellingham and Kane help England reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Jude Bellingham responds to England's critics following the side's dramatic win against Slovakia in the last 16 of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham says it is 'nice to give a bit back' after England criticism

articles.description: Former captain Alan Shearer on England's dramatic Euro 2024 win over Slovakia and how boss Gareth Southgate will not change his ways.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'We have to accept this is England's identity' - Alan Shearer

articles.description: Live text commentary as Spain play Georgia in Euro 2024 last 16, with Germany awaiting winners.
articles.title: Spain vs Georgia LIVE: Euro 2024 football score, commentary, line-ups & updates

articles.description: Simone Biles qualifies for the US Paris Olympics team, saying she knew she would be back at a Games.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: US gymnast Simone Biles qualifies

articles.description: James Anderson will join the England coaching set-up as a fast-bowling mentor when he retires from Test cricket at Lord’s next week.
articles.title: James Anderson to join England coaching set-up as bowling mentor

articles.description: Lando Norris accuses Max Verstappen, his friend and now closest rival, of driving that was “a little bit desperate”, after a battle at the Austrian GP.
articles.title: Austrian GP: Lando Norris fumes at Max Verstappen move

articles.description:
England's Jude Bellingham says "you hear people talk a lot of rubbish" and that "it's nice that when you deliver, you can give them a little bit back".


Bellingham's last-minute stunning overhead kick took England's game against Slovakia into extra-time and they went on to  win 2-1  and progress to the quarter-finals of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: 'You hear people talk a lot of rubbish' about England

articles.description: Former Portugal defender Jose Fonte on life in the camp with Cristiano Ronaldo at a major tournament and what it took to win the European Championship in 2016.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Ice baths at 2am - life with Cristiano Ronaldo's Portugal
